# Copilot Instructions (Repo-Wide)

## General
- Prefer small, reviewable changes.
- Do not invent new frameworks or tools unless explicitly asked.
- Keep edits consistent with existing patterns in this repo.

## Code Quality
- Preserve existing formatting and conventions.
- Add/update tests only if the repo already uses them.
- Explain tradeoffs briefly in PR-style notes when making architectural choices.
- Align with existing spectroscopic reduction pipelines and standards (especially pyKOSMOS, PypeIt, python based reduction pipelines).

## Project Commands
- Use existing scripts/commands from README or package files.
- Do not add new build tooling unless required.

## Files & Structure
- Place new code near related code; do not reorganize directories.
- Avoid large refactors unless requested.
